quest.name: A Tool's Errand
journal:
By the look in her eyes, Qhoterl Pasol has tools on her mind.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid iron ore in the Blind Forest of Yx'MajaDeliver the splendid iron ore to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid flax in the Blind Forest of Yx'MajaDeliver the splendid flax to Qhoterl PasolCatch a splendid clawbow at Mjrl's RegretDeliver the splendid clawbow to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Rigorously as we work, we quickly wear down our tools until there's nothing left save the hilt. And a tool with only a hilt is no tool at all, I'm sure you'll agree.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: To be sure, not all of our implements have hilts, but the point stands that we need to replace them quite regularly. And it's my responsibility to ensure that we always have the materials with which to make them.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: To that end, I'd be much obliged if you could mine for me, shall we say, three chunks of iron ore. They can be found in the Blind Forest of Yx'Maja. My thanks in advance, good madamsir.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: To that end, I'd be much obliged if you could gather for me, shall we say, three clumps of flax. They can be found in the Blind Forest of Yx'Maja. My thanks in advance, good madamsir.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: To that end, I'd be much obliged if you could catch a clawbow for me. They're native to the Blind Forest of Yx'Maja, and I'm given to understand that fruit worms make the best bait. My thanks in advance, good madamsir.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Remember, it's three chunks of iron ore I require. You will find them in the Blind Forest of Yx'Maja. My thanks in advance, good madamsir.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Remember, it's three clumps of flax I require. You will find them in the Blind Forest of Yx'Maja. My thanks in advance, good madamsir.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Remember, it's a clawbow I require. They're native to the Blind Forest of Yx'Maja, and I'm given to understand that fruit worms make the best bait. My thanks in advance, good madamsir.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Jolly good, you're returned. And with the requested item, I trust?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: My, such splendid chunks of ore these are! They shall make the sturdiest shovels and pickaxes, oh yes!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: My, such splendid clumps of flax these are! They shall make the sturdiest rope, oh yes!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: My, such a splendid specimen of clawbow this is! Their sturdy pincers can find use in many a tool, oh yes. My gratitude, good madamsir!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Thanks to your kind assistance, we have all that we require for now, but we'll have need of more before long. I hope that you'll lend us your procuring expertise again.
